text.section:
A petition for the election of an exclusive representative of a bargaining unit may be filed with the Board by:
an employee organization seeking certification as an exclusive representative; or
an employee, a group of employees, or an employee organization seeking a new election to determine an exclusive representative.

A petition shall:
contain the information the Board requires; and
be accompanied by a showing of interest supported by 30% of the employees in the appropriate unit indicating their desire to be exclusively represented by the petitioner for the purpose of collective bargaining.
